trans-unit.source: collectd: perf stats for Java on Unix in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: collectd: perf stats for Java on Unix in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Extended monitoring of your Java website with the CollectD plug-in for Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Extended monitoring of your Java website with the CollectD plug-in for Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in Preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in Preview.

trans-unit.source: To explore Unix system performance metrics in <linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title>, install <linkText>collectd</linkText><title></title>, together with its Application Insights plug-in.
trans-unit.target: To explore Unix system performance metrics in <linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title>, install <linkText>collectd</linkText><title></title>, together with its Application Insights plug-in.

trans-unit.source: This open-source solution gathers a variety of system and network statistics.
trans-unit.target: This open-source solution gathers a variety of system and network statistics.

trans-unit.source: Typically you'll use collectd if you have already <linkText>instrumented your Java web service with Application Insights[java]</linkText><title></title>, so that you have more data to help you to enhance your app's performance or diagnose problems.
trans-unit.target: Typically you'll use collectd if you have already <linkText>instrumented your Java web service with Application Insights[java]</linkText><title></title>, so that you have more data to help you to enhance your app's performance or diagnose problems.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Sample charts</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Sample charts</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the <linkText>Microsoft Azure portal</linkText><title></title>, open the <linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title> resource where you want the data to appear.
trans-unit.target: In the <linkText>Microsoft Azure portal</linkText><title></title>, open the <linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title> resource where you want the data to appear.

trans-unit.source: (Or <linkText>create a new resource</linkText><title></title>.)
trans-unit.target: (Or <linkText>create a new resource</linkText><title></title>.)

trans-unit.source: Take a copy of the instrumentation key, which identifies the resource.
trans-unit.target: Take a copy of the instrumentation key, which identifies the resource.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Browse all, open your resource, and then in the Esssentials drop-down, select and copy the Instrumentation Key</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Browse all, open your resource, and then in the Esssentials drop-down, select and copy the Instrumentation Key</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On your Unix server machine(s):
trans-unit.target: On your Unix server machine(s):

trans-unit.source: Install <linkText>collectd</linkText><title></title> version 5.4.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: Install <linkText>collectd</linkText><title></title> version 5.4.0 or later.

trans-unit.source: Download the <linkText>Application Insights collectd writer plugin</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Download the <linkText>Application Insights collectd writer plugin</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Note the version number.
trans-unit.target: Note the version number.

trans-unit.source: Copy the plugin JAR into /usr/share/collectd/java.
trans-unit.target: Copy the plugin JAR into /usr/share/collectd/java.

trans-unit.source: Edit /etc/collectd/collectd.conf:
trans-unit.target: Edit /etc/collectd/collectd.conf:

trans-unit.source: Ensure that <linkText>the Java plugin</linkText><title></title> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that <linkText>the Java plugin</linkText><title></title> is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Update the JVMArg for the java.class.path to include the following JAR.
trans-unit.target: Update the JVMArg for the java.class.path to include the following JAR.

trans-unit.source: Update the version number to match the one you downloaded:
trans-unit.target: Update the version number to match the one you downloaded:

trans-unit.source: /usr/share/collectd/java/applicationinsights-collectd-0.9.4.jar
trans-unit.target: /usr/share/collectd/java/applicationinsights-collectd-0.9.4.jar

trans-unit.source: Add this snippet, using the Instrumentation Key from your resource:
trans-unit.target: Add this snippet, using the Instrumentation Key from your resource:

trans-unit.source: Here's part of a sample configuration file:
trans-unit.target: Here's part of a sample configuration file:

trans-unit.source: Configure other [collectd plugins](https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/TableofPlugins), which can collect a variety of data from different sources.
trans-unit.target: Configure other [collectd plugins](https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/TableofPlugins), which can collect a variety of data from different sources.

trans-unit.source: Restart collectd according to its <linkText>manual</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Restart collectd according to its <linkText>manual</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In your Application Insights resource, open <linkText>Metrics Explorer and add charts[metrics]</linkText><title></title>, selecting the metrics you want to see from the Custom category.
trans-unit.target: In your Application Insights resource, open <linkText>Metrics Explorer and add charts[metrics]</linkText><title></title>, selecting the metrics you want to see from the Custom category.

trans-unit.source: By default, the metrics are aggregated across all host machines from which the metrics were collected.
trans-unit.target: By default, the metrics are aggregated across all host machines from which the metrics were collected.

trans-unit.source: To view the metrics per host, in the Chart details blade, turn on Grouping and then choose to group by CollectD-Host.
trans-unit.target: To view the metrics per host, in the Chart details blade, turn on Grouping and then choose to group by CollectD-Host.

trans-unit.source: By default, the Application Insights plugin will send all the data collected by all the enabled collectd 'read' plugins.
trans-unit.target: By default, the Application Insights plugin will send all the data collected by all the enabled collectd 'read' plugins.

trans-unit.source: To exclude data from specific plugins or data sources:
trans-unit.target: To exclude data from specific plugins or data sources:

trans-unit.source: Edit the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Edit the configuration file.

trans-unit.source: In , add directive lines like this:
trans-unit.target: In , add directive lines like this:

trans-unit.source: Directive
trans-unit.target: Directive

trans-unit.source: Effect
trans-unit.target: Effect

trans-unit.source: Exclude disk
trans-unit.target: Exclude disk

trans-unit.source: Exclude all data collected by the disk plugin
trans-unit.target: Exclude all data collected by the disk plugin

trans-unit.source: Exclude disk:read,write
trans-unit.target: Exclude disk:read,write

trans-unit.source: Exclude the sources named read and write from the disk plugin.
trans-unit.target: Exclude the sources named read and write from the disk plugin.

trans-unit.source: Separate directives with a newline.
trans-unit.target: Separate directives with a newline.

trans-unit.source: I don't see data in the portal
trans-unit.target: I don't see data in the portal

trans-unit.source: Open <linkText>Search[diagnostic]</linkText><title></title> to see if the raw events have arrived.
trans-unit.target: Open <linkText>Search[diagnostic]</linkText><title></title> to see if the raw events have arrived.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes they take longer to appear in metrics explorer.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes they take longer to appear in metrics explorer.

trans-unit.source: Enable tracing in the Application Insights plugin. Add this line within :
trans-unit.target: Enable tracing in the Application Insights plugin. Add this line within :

trans-unit.source: SDKLogger true
trans-unit.target: SDKLogger true

trans-unit.source: Open a terminal and start collectd in verbose mode, to see any issues it is reporting:
trans-unit.target: Open a terminal and start collectd in verbose mode, to see any issues it is reporting:

trans-unit.source: sudo collectd -f
trans-unit.target: sudo collectd -f
